title: Mol CX: Mathieu van der Poel Distances Wout van Aert, Lucinda Brand Unrivaled
content:
In this first clash between two of the 'Big Three,' the reigning world champion came out on top. Brand delivered a controlled victory in the women's race.

Read the full article at Mol CX: Mathieu van der Poel Distances Wout van Aert, Lucinda Brand Unrivaled on Velo.
author: ahood
